name: Mega Creature Smash: Ultra Turbo VR Edition
name_original: Mega Creature Smash: Ultra Turbo VR Edition
description:
Smash everything in sight! Punch through walls, windows, and floors to take down the building but be careful, private military has been hired to stop you. Use your hands to defend yourself against an onslaught of bullets, rockets, and missiles as you climb your way to the top.

Gameplay Video http://youtu.be/xDA7gH-snGE
